name: CodeAnt AI
headline: AI Code Reviewer
description:
CodeAnt AI is an AI code reviewer that helps you find and fix critical code quality issues and security vulnerabilities in 30+ languages. Start your 7-day free trial today!.

We are SOC 2 compliant, and are live in small teams to large unicorns.

founders.name: Amartya Jha, Founder
founders.description: Amartya is the Co-Founder & CEO of CodeAnt AI. Prior to this role, he led the DevOps and Infrastructure teams at unicorns like Zeta and ShareChat, scaling their infrastructures and applications to handle hundreds of millions of requests. He has a passion for discussing pain points in refactoring and optimizing code, and exploring ways to effortlessly enforce clean code across an organization. That's what he is building at CodeAnt AI.

founders.name: Chinmay Bharti, Founder
founders.description: Chinmay is the co-founder and CTO of CodeAnt AI, a devtool that enforces clean code effortlessly. Prior to CodeAnt, Chinmay was the founding engineer at Zevi AI and built search infrastructure for the biggest D2C brands to handle millions of requests. Before that, he was a quant developer at Blu Analytics and wrote optimized code for backtesting engines. He received a BTech / MTech in Electrical engineering + signal processing from the Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: CodeAnt AI**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator Batch W24, CodeAnt AI is making waves with its innovative AI-powered code review platform. Residing in San Francisco, this nimble team of three is on a mission to elevate code quality and security across diverse programming languages—over 30, to be precise. Whether you're a startup or a unicorn, CodeAnt AI aims to enhance your code's integrity with its robust solutions.

**Mission and Product Offering**

The central purpose of CodeAnt AI is to provide an AI code reviewer that assists developers in identifying and rectifying critical quality issues and security vulnerabilities in their codebases. Users can kick off their journey with a 7-day free trial and enjoy benefits like unlimited PR summaries, real-time code assessments, and customizable checks tailored to fit any coding standards.

**Security and Compliance**

Security is paramount for CodeAnt AI. It proudly holds SOC 2 compliance and adheres to strict data protection practices—making it a reliable partner for organizations concerned about security vulnerabilities in their code. 

**Testimonials and Impact**

The platform has garnered positive feedback from users like Aman Bapna, Director of Engineering at Kuku FM, who states that CodeAnt AI streamlines the code review process and improves accuracy. With features that can drastically cut code review time—by up to 50%—and the ability to analyze millions of lines of code quickly, it's clear that CodeAnt AI is not just another tool; it's a game-changer in the realm of code quality.

**What’s Next?**

As the tech landscape evolves, so does CodeAnt AI, with plans to expand features further, backed by their growing portfolio of satisfied customers. For those looking to save time and ensure the security of their code, now's a great time to check them out. Go ahead and visit their website to start your trial—your code deserves it!

**Discover more at [CodeAnt AI's website](https://codeant.ai/)**.
